participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Energetic and playful, enjoys humor and light-hearted conversations.
participant_1.background: I like donuts. On weekends, I do live action roleplaying events. I play a lot of Call of Duty. I drive a Ford Pinto. My favorite band is the Insane Clown Posse.

participant_2.name: Evelyn
participant_2.personality: Warm and nurturing, loves to share experiences and stories.
participant_2.background: I am retired and living the great life. I have amazing children and grandchildren. I had cancer, but it's gone now. I can sew my own clothes.
